channel.title: [PI] Npc's Wont Die
channel.description:
Npc wont die, iv done something and idk what it is... cause it works with my base.. fk..
Iv tried adding just the death gfx in NPCHandler but nothing.. also after you kill the npc and try to right click him i get a T2, and T1 error in client. Please Help!
